XRMediaBinding.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRMediaBinding interface is used to create layers that display the content of an .

blockquote.para: Only the video frames will be displayed in the layer. Video controls need to be implemented separately and must be drawn in another layer.

XRMediaBindingCreateCylinderLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createCylinderLayer() method of the interface returns an object which is a layer that takes up a curved rectangular space in the virtual environment.

XRMediaBindingCreateEquirectLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createEquirectLayer() method of the interface returns an object which is a layer that maps an equirectangular coded data onto the inside of a sphere.

XRMediaBindingCreateQuadLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createQuadLayer() method of the interface returns an object which is a layer that takes up a flat rectangular space in the virtual environment.

XRMediaBindingXRMediaBinding.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRMediaBinding() constructor creates and returns a new object.
